Class Chess

public class Chess
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Ria Parikh Alexander Osterman

    Class that refers to the knight piece in chess.
    (package private) static class  Chess.move
    Class to keep track of a particular move
    (package private) static class  Chess.pawn
    Class that refers to the pawn piece of the chess.
    (package private) static class  Chess.piece
    An abstract class to provide a common functionality for all the pieces in chess
    (package private) static class  Chess.queen
    Class that refers to the queen piece in chess.
    (package private) static class  Chess.rook
    Class that refers to the rook piece in chess.
    (package private) static class  Chess.space
    Class that keeps track of each particular space(square) on the chessboard

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static Chess.space blackKingLocation
    A variable to track the location of the king of the black team

    An Arraylist to keep track of the number of black colored pieces in the game
    static Chess.space[][] board
    An 8x8 board of type 'space' that resembles an actual chess board (to play chess on)
    static boolean draw
    A boolean variable that is set to True in case of a draw
    static boolean promoted
    a variable for reverting the board correctly on a promotion
    static boolean resign
    A boolean variable that is set to True in case one of the player resigns
    static boolean turn
    A variable to keep track of which team's turn is it.
    static int twoSteps
    A variable to keep track whether the first move of a pawn was a single step or a double step.

  • Field Details

    • whitePieces

      static java.util.ArrayList<Chess.piece> whitePieces
      An Arraylist to keep track of the number of white colored pieces in the game

    • blackPieces

      static java.util.ArrayList<Chess.piece> blackPieces
      An Arraylist to keep track of the number of black colored pieces in the game

    • turn

      public static boolean turn
      A variable to keep track of which team's turn is it. True means white's turn, False means black's turn

    • whiteKingLocation

      public static Chess.space whiteKingLocation
      A variable to track the location of the king of the white team

    • blackKingLocation

      public static Chess.space blackKingLocation
      A variable to track the location of the king of the black team

    • board

      public static Chess.space[][] board
      An 8x8 board of type 'space' that resembles an actual chess board (to play chess on)

    • draw

      public static boolean draw
      A boolean variable that is set to True in case of a draw

    • resign

      public static boolean resign
      A boolean variable that is set to True in case one of the player resigns

    • promoted

      public static boolean promoted
      a variable for reverting the board correctly on a promotion

    • twoSteps

      public static int twoSteps
      A variable to keep track whether the first move of a pawn was a single step or a double step. In case the pawn takes two steps in the first move, the value of twosteps is set to the file index of the pawn. If not, then by default it is -1

      public Chess()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main function in order to get the chess game running
      Parameters:
      args - for the main function

    • drawboard

      private static void drawboard()
      A method to draw the chessboard in order for the user to view it

    • parseinput

      private static Chess.move parseinput()
      A method to get the next specific move from the user
      Returns:
      move The specific move to be performed on what particular piece

    • isValidInput

      private static boolean isValidInput​(Chess.move input)
      A method to check if the particular value inputted by the user is valid or not
      Parameters:
      input - move performed by the user
      Returns:
      True if the input is valid, false is the input is not valid

    • execute

      private static void execute​(Chess.move move)
      A method to perform the move inputted by the user on a specific piece in the game
      Parameters:
      move - to be executed

    • isGameOver

      private static boolean isGameOver()
      A method to check if the game is over, or if it is to be conitnued playing
      Returns:
      True if there is a checkmate, draw or a resign. False otherwise

    • checkmate

      private static boolean checkmate()
      A method to check if there is a checkmate in the game or not
      Returns:
      True if there is a checkmate, false if there is no checkmate

    • printResult

      private static void printResult()
      A method to print the result of the game

    • initialize

      private static void initialize()
      A method to intialize the chessboard

    • updateAttacks

      private static void updateAttacks()
      A method that checks which squares are under attack after each move made by the users

    • revertBoard

      private static void revertBoard​(Chess.move move, Chess.piece piece)
      A method that reverts that particular move and resets the chessboard to the way it was before that particular move
      Parameters:
      move - what move is to be performed
      piece - piece to be moved

    • testMove

      private static boolean testMove​(Chess.move move)
      A method to check if that particular move could be the next valid move
      Parameters:
      move - move to be performed
      Returns:
      True if the particular move can be performed, false if the move cannot be performed
